projects.title: Automatic File-Sorting System
projects.description: Experience a revolutionary file sorting powerhouse that harnesses multiple modalities to break down and organize your files with lightning speed. Designed to transform chaos into order with intelligent analysis and dynamic classification.

projects.title: Automated Social Media Content Manager
projects.description: A human-in-the-loop social media content manager that uses fine-tuned SOTA (State of the Art) AI image models to generate content and pushes them to a spreadsheet for review and approval. If approved, it will automatically schedule and push the content across your entire social media presence.

projects.title: RSS Meta Automation
projects.description: An automatic content creator that uses an RSS feed to grab relevant (already existing) content. Once grabbed, it will analyze and break-down the content before passing it through a series of fine-tuned AI agents to create a polished, engaging, and optimized Instagram post, and Facebook post - Which it will then schedule for you.
features: Capture trending content relevant to you or your brand NOW
AI trained on your brand voice and style to ensure your message is consistent
Fine-tuned SOTA AI image models to generate eye-catching content that doesn't feel like AI.
BUILT for agencies, or anyone who wants to scale and improve their current workflow for creating social media content.

projects.title: Database Integration Specialist
projects.description: Your all-knowing assistance for integrating a database to your project.

projects.title: Dating App Wingman GPT
projects.description: A GPT-powered dating app wingman that helps users craft engaging and authentic dating profiles and messages.

projects.title: Guided Librarian GPT
projects.description: An intelligent library assistant that helps users discover and navigate through literary resources.

projects.title: Spotify Playlist DJ
projects.description: An intelligent music curation system using Pydantic for structured playlist generation and management.

projects.title: Project Implementation Planner
projects.description: A GPT-powered system for detailed project planning and implementation strategy development.

projects.title: SaaS Development Mastermind
projects.description: A GPT-powered assistant for SaaS development guidance and strategy optimization.

projects.title: Appointment Setter Voice AI
projects.description: An advanced voice AI system that handles appointment scheduling with a personalized voice, creating a more natural and engaging interaction for users.

projects.title: Personal Telegram AI Assistant
projects.description: A versatile Telegram-based AI assistant equipped with a comprehensive toolkit, enabling users to perform various tasks directly through chat interface.

projects.title: Invoice Data Extraction Agent
projects.description: An intelligent invoicing agent that extracts requested information from invoices and exports it in a clean, comprehensive report.

projects.title: Meeting Intelligence Assistant
projects.description: A personalized agent that 'listens in' to meetings, automatically generates tailored reports and summaries, and distributes them to all participants via email.

projects.title: Automated Job Application Processor
projects.description: This AI-powered workflow automates the process of handling job applications by extracting relevant information from submitted forms, portfolios, and emails, analyzing the candidate's qualifications against a predefined profile, and storing the results in a Google Sheet.

projects.title: Intelligent Lead Generation Workflow
projects.description: An intelligent Lead Generation workflow that uses AI Vision to scrape websites for relevant business information, including contact info and/or product/offering info, and generates a comprehensive report of the site and owner, and finally crafts a personalized email tailored to the site owner.
